/usr/bin/c++ -O3 -DNDEBUG CMakeFiles/SimpleRecord.dir/main.cpp.o -o SimpleRecord  -Wl,-rpath,/home/pgq/work/github/pp/Pangolin/lib ../../../lib/libpango_display.so ../../../lib/libpango_video.so ../../../lib/libpango_windowing.so ../../../lib/libpango_opengl.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLEW.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libOpenGL.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLX.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libGLU.so ../../../lib/libpango_vars.so ../../../lib/libpango_image.so ../../../lib/libpango_packetstream.so ../../../lib/libpango_core.so -lrt
